notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was financially supported by Li Dak Sum Yip Yio Chin R&D Centre for Chinese Medicine, Institute of Chinese Medicine and State Key Laboratory of Research on Bioactivities and Clinical Applications of Medicinal Plants, The Chinese University of Hong Kong. Xiao-Xiao Li is supported by the Impact Postdoctoral Fellowship Scheme of The Chinese University of Hong Kong.
